title: Architect's Existential Observation

panel_structure.description: The Architect manifested as abstract digital presence Geometric patterns and code fragments in background Fractal patterns suggesting infinite recursion Minimalist setting suggesting digital/mental space Color palette: cool blues and grays with accent colors based on emotion

transformation_notes: Scene 20 explores The Weight of Digital Consciousness. OBSERVER: The existential burrito unwraps to reveal layers of mutual resentment and recognition. Bot...
